resources:
Train Schedule Recent Search Notices
This Application consists of four card
view tabs and bottom navigation tabs.
Those are called Search, Notices,
History, Settings and Home.
In search tab you can find trains based
on starting station to ending station
depending on the next available train or the daily schedule.
The searches can filter according to
date and time.
-
Once you have entered the search you
will get train schedule list from
which you can obtained detailed
information on a selected scheduled
station station to ending station,
time and date.
